Interface VerifiedTransactionBuilder<R extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.ResponseBuilder>


  • public interface VerifiedTransactionBuilder<R extends com.ca.codesv.sdk.ResponseBuilder>
    VerifiedTransactionBuilder provides the means for specifying verification of observed Requests.
